comment: * A request object for generating TextSelection.

methods.name: public CharSequence getText()
methods.comment:
* Returns the text providing context for the selected text (which is specified by the
         * sub sequence starting at startIndex and ending at endIndex).

methods.name: public int getStartIndex()
methods.comment: * Returns start index of the selected part of text.

methods.name: public int getEndIndex()
methods.comment: * Returns end index of the selected part of text.

methods.name: public boolean isDarkLaunchAllowed()
methods.comment:
* Returns true if the TextClassifier should return selection suggestions when "dark
         * launched". Otherwise, returns false.
         *
         * @hide

methods.name: public LocaleList getDefaultLocales()
methods.comment:
* @return ordered list of locale preferences that can be used to disambiguate the
         * provided text.

methods.name: public String getCallingPackageName()
methods.comment:
* Returns the name of the package that sent this request.
         * This returns {@code null} if no calling package name is set.

methods.name: public void setSystemTextClassifierMetadata(@Nullable SystemTextClassifierMetadata systemTcMetadata)
methods.comment:
* Sets the information about the {@link SystemTextClassifier} that sent this request.
         *
         * @hide

methods.name: public SystemTextClassifierMetadata getSystemTextClassifierMetadata()
methods.comment:
* Returns the information about the {@link SystemTextClassifier} that sent this request.
         *
         * @hide

methods.name: public Bundle getExtras()
methods.comment:
* Returns the extended data. * *

NOTE: Do not modify this bundle.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)
